Description: Ostracon, fragment from the body of a red-brown pottery vessel, the fabric has a dark-grey core, interior slightly grooved, with very faint traces of a black-painted hieratic text on the exterior.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393105) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393105)
